title: Multiple insights into the two-sided effects of foliar application of cerium oxide nanoparticles on the growth of alfalfa (Medicago sativa L.)
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00271G, Paper
Zhao Chen, Zhipeng Guo, Nan Xu, Md. Zulfikar Khan, Junpeng Niu
Nanotechnology has a wide range of applications, and the pollution and toxicity of their overuse must also be taken seriously. The dual effects of cerium oxide nanoparticles (CeO2 NPs) on...
